summary: So guys I bought the BNHA gym uniform joggers and jacket from hot topic and they finally came in and I’m so freaking...
body:
So guys I bought the BNHA gym uniform joggers and jacket from hot topic and they finally came in and I’m so freaking happy

They’re so comfy and I just love them

Aaaaahhhhhh

Now I can cosplay casual Shoto AND gym Shoto

blog.name: 1b-headcanons
blog.title: Writing for the underappreciated class
blog.description: About Requests are OPEN! Inbox has 55 items.

summary: Do you have any Hiryu Rin headcanons?
question: Do you have any Hiryu Rin headcanons?
answer:
I still do… always do… this is gonna be a big big check (including new canon stuff)

- it’s mentioned in his bio that he is “serious and diligent”

- he’s an exchange student, and now knowing his personality I guess he works really hard because he’s scared of falling behind

- the Japanese school system is reputed to be very strict and hard, so it explains once again his overall nervosity in the first days at school, nervosity that keeps sticking to him whenever there are exams and others

- canonically cold blooded. There are a lot of headcanons about that I made, check the Hiryu Rin tag in the blog !

- stated as close-range (canon), although he can shoot his scales. That probably means he can’t shoot scales really far, though probably precisely– remember how he shoot a lightning beam ? Yeah that.

- martial arts expert. I’m kinda deceived we didn’t see that a lot (he got kicked down by Tsuyu too easily dammit)

- his hero alias is Dragon Shroud ! And his costume has been inspired of Jiangshi– Chinese “hopping vampire” or “reanimated corpse”. For more interesting info, these demons are described to hop around with their arms outstretched and always be stiff, dressed in clothes similar to those of the Qing dynasty. They kill people by absorbing their “qi” or life force.

- using these newly learned info, headcanon that he hates peaches and mirrors.

- mirrors ? He doesn’t like seeing his reflection. Unlike some people who like to check if they look good, he ignores shiny things as much as he can.

- his hair is sometimes in a bun when he works, and when he sleeps it’s let lose. He doesn’t like going around with his hair lose though, he thinks it’s too… not practical.

- ((when he was small he was called out at school for looking too feminine. But he loves his long hair so much, he finds a way to keep it without looking like a woman. Insecure about that.))

- fascinated by old japanese and Chinese culture (yo-kai, traditions…). Not very interested in Europe, doesn’t like to make himself remember how big the world is and how insignificant he is compared to it.

You can find more headcanons throughout the blog, I remember doing quite a few of them for Rin ! -mod copycat

summary:
Spinner: We're playing Scrabble. It's a nightmare.
Toga: Scrabble? Scrabble's great.
Spinner: Not when you're playing with Mr....
body:
Spinner: We're playing Scrabble. It's a nightmare.
Toga: Scrabble? Scrabble's great.
Spinner: Not when you're playing with Mr. Compress, it's not. He puts words like "ephemeral". I put "dog".
